The phone has an excellent display with very good touch response.the rear 13 mp serves well in well lit conditions also the front flash provides an extra edge.apps and games run very smoothly on snapdragon 430.the build quality is not upto to the mark.though a good phone to buy.

I did not expect this phone from samsung with such a wornderful price tag and features.. I was able to get it for 12600 INR. The only drawback i found is its low speaker volume,, but that did not bother me because there is a workaround to increase its volume.. Samsung really working hard to make its touchwiz snappier and this time,, they managed it to be more snappier than pure android. Gaming performance is awesome.. Display is awesome.. I did not liked the earphones.. So i ordered another earphone to use with this.. RAM is less but performance is far better than higher RAM models.. I compared it with moto x play and overall j7 is clear winner.Android 5.1 out of the box. Battery life is awesome compared to rebranded phones in market and no heating issues which is the most common problem in xiomi, yureka, lenovo.. Belive me guys i bought this phone after a lot of reasearch and i bought this phone to give me peace of mind.. I did not wanted my phone to get heat up  everytime i use it for 5 minutes. .Thank you samsung for this great phone and amazon for great offer.Pardon typos...
This much I can say, considering all parameters it is really an user friendly mobile. It is very good among 4G compatible mobiles.
very good with this price.. camera quality is unbelievable.. phone is soo fast nd the new feature theme will make ur ph look good.. i m posting one of the pic taken from my j7

reviews.review_header: Its Not That Great But Okay For Light Users
reviews.review_text: Hello Apoorv Here From Tech News By Apoorv And Here Is My Review For This DeviceGreat Viewing Experience with Capacitive Touch screenThe 5.5-inch Super AMOLED HD touchscreen of Samsung Galaxy J7 SM-J700F provides you with the best display. The screen comes with a resolution of 720 x 1280 pixels, 267 ppi pixels of density and colour support of 16M for further enhancement of picture quality. The touchscreen is super responsive to the tap of your fingers so that you can smoothly glide through the pages and widgets of the phone.Snaps and Selfies ZoneIf you prefer a smartphone that features a great camera, the Samsung Galaxy J7 could just be your device. The two hi-tech cameras offered by this Smartphone allow you to capture beautiful and charming shots and selfies. The 13 megapixel main camera is equipped with features like LED flash, Auto Focus, Panorama, Beauty Face, Sound & Shot, Continuous Shot and HDR (High Dynamic Range) to provide you with crystal clear images. Also, there is front 5 megapixel camera to capture ideal and cool selfies. Forget blurred and vague images and cherish beautifully captured memories with Galaxy J7 by Samsung.Sturdy and Durable BatteryThis Smartphone provides you with a solid 3000mAh battery of lithium-ion make which is not only long-lasting but also high on strength. You can now watch more videos, movies and play games for extended hours with Samsung Galaxy J7.High on PerformanceThere is 1.5GHz Octa Core Processor and 1.5GB RAM to ensure that you can seamlessly multitask on your Galaxy J7 at a fast pace. The Android 5.1.1 Lollipop Operating System provides a perfect platform to this Smartphone for smooth working of all the applications.Added FeaturesThere is internal memory space of 16GB in the Galaxy J7 by Samsung, which can further be expanded to 128GB with the help of an external SD card. So, now there is more room for storing all your important data and other multimedia files. This Smartphone works on dual SIM.Buying Link- Samsung Galaxy J7 (Gold)

reviews.review_header: Screen is brittle and could damaged
reviews.review_text: Screen blanked out on its own. Samsung says that the screen is damaged from inside due to misuse. The phone has not had a single fall, there is no visible sign of damage on the outside but the screen seems to have got damaged. It could have been damaged at the factory stage, however, there is nothing to do but pay for the screen. What is perturbing is that there re other customers who have had such a situation with Samsung J7 phones.Strangely in my office there are people who are careless and many a times have dropped their phones but none of their screens ever get damaged.The phone works good otherwise but the screen is an issue.

Otherwise the phone is very good .

Decent phone but display and touchscreen is highly prone to damage. Exactly six months after I bought this device, it fell from a height of 3-4 in a softslip and the display went blank. Despite the screen guard in place and no apparent scrack on the screen, this device is now virtually useless. Samsung authorised service centre says it costs 5k and takes 15 days min. to get this working. Obviously they give no warranties calling this a physical damage.

Excellent phone...I have been using this phone for more than a year and I can assure you that you will not regret buying this one. I bought mine from Samsung retail store so I cannot talk about amazon service for this product.The only problem with J7 is that it does not feature Corning Gorilla glass. But if you get a tampered glass, the phone's screen will be protected from dust and scratches. If you need gorilla glass protection, you might want to buy J7 prime. It has all the features of J7 2015 model except AMOLED display which I think is far better than IPS display in terms of color depth and brightness of the screen.When it comes to gaming performance, this phone is the beast. You can play almost all games on the play store without any lag whatsoever. I have tested following games on my phone with maximum possible graphics settings- NOVA 3, GTA San Andreas, Gangster Vegas, Modern Combat 5.Battery backup on this phone is also very impressive. Once fully charged, you can use it for almost two days with normal use (wifi turned on, phone calls (~2 hours a day), music (~1 hour a day).If you are looking for a budget phone with all the essential features, Galaxy J7 is the right phone for you.

reviews.review_header: Non reliable low quality phone having problems with display and they will never cover it under warranty.
reviews.review_text: I have purchased j7 through amazon on 30th october.a few days back a white line appeared on my display and I approached service centre and they are claiming that display went off due to internal damage caused by excessive pressure applied while using the phone and cant be covered under warranty!!!!.my phone looks brand new.they are asking for 6500 rs for screen.i called samsung customer care and they are putting forward absurd reasons:“*putting in jeans pocket*putting in bag etc can cause the display to get damaged and hence not covered under warranty!!!I am going to fight against samsung legally.Also please dont buy j7.j7 is very low quality phone that lacks reliability and hence they are promoting it through online market places like amazon and flipkart.you can get better mobiles from lg motorola etc.u can google reviews about j7 and see the complaints.

reviews.review_header: First the display is big and awesome, the touch is even better than other samsung ...
reviews.review_text: I will write this review step by step. First the display is big and awesome, the touch is even better than other samsung phones and can be comparable to samsung s6 and far better than micromax and etc. I bought the phone 2 months ago and it got fell down 3 times since then but it is working as good as new. The 3000mah battery is really awesome no heating issue at all, playing asphalt 8 for 2 hrs and it gives me 24 hr full backup on single charge, yes i used it for 24 hrs(Day+ Night)  on single charge while on a vacation. Dont worry about the 1.5 gb ram trust me it works better than micromax phone having 2 gb ram. My phone never hang at all although i'm a heavy gamer playing asphalt8 all day. And the camera is just awesome both the front and rear. I'm uploading a photo i have clicked on my phone camera.

I purchased it from flipkart 3 months back. The major highlight of this phone is it's battery and display. I am a hard user of mobile with whole day WiFi use and 20-25 calls. Charging full in morning leaves me with around 45% battery at 10.00 p.m.The display is crisp and bright. Camera is not excellent but very good. Features like smart manager and otg support makes it a good deal. Coupled with extended storage, dual sim, 4g LTE,  it is a steal at this price. Though the Ram is only 1.5 gb still I have never seen this phone lagging. Finally the after sale customer service is very good courtesy to large offline dealership of Samsung. I highly recommend this phone.

I purchased Samsung J7 on 15/12/15. But within a very short time of 5 months it's display shows some problems. It completly gets blurred when brightness reduced and nothing is visible then. As it was in warranty period so I sent it to service centre. They told me to get its feedback after one week. When I asked for it after one week they told me that they could not rectify it as already such type of problems is already pending in their service centre for a long time. They told me to wait again for 15- 20 days. This is complete negligence of customer canplaints and harrasement to customer. Very very disappointed with Samsung service. Will NEVER BUY a SAMSUNG phone.

Excellent budget Smartphone from Samsung!!! The features that Samsung Installed in this device are amazing because Earlier Samsung devices with excellent features and specification were little expensive now after Launch of Samsung Galaxy J7,the wait for perfect budget phone is over!! My friend use this device and i also like this phone!!! So my review goes this way!!Pros :**Excellent display Quality (5,5 Inch)**Battery backup brilliant(3000mAH).**Camera very good (Primary 13MP And Front 5Mp)**Good after sales services**No lag no heating problems.**Can play high graphics games.**1.5 GB Ram and good processor.**16 GB internal storage and can be expanded upto 128 GB.**The phone charges fast.**.Latest Android version(v6.0 Marshmallow).Cons:-**The Speaker are at the backside.**Speaker volume is little bit low.**It would be perfect phone if there was 2 GB ram.So here is my honest review about this phone as i used this phone for 2-3 days!!!! Recommended for all those who are looking for a branded Budget smartphone!!!

Best phone in midrange comparing to xiaomi 4, 4i, moto g3, even moto X This phone is the best phone with amazing superamoled display, Camera, Speed.... everything is perfect in this phone. Fully satisfied with J7. Thanks Samsung for making such phone under 14k.
